content:
{"name": "SeaGate Food Bank", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Donate non-perishable food items and instantly win Free SlotPlay!
WIN UP TO $5,000 FREE SLOTPLAY

Donate non-perishable food every Wednesday in the Promotionals Area to claim your $5-$5,000 Free SlotPlay prize at any kiosk.
Be sure to also claim your FREE entry ticket to place into the drawing drum for a chance to win a bonus Free SlotPlay prize at 7:15pm.
The top 3 guests who donate the most food every Wednesday win up to $500 bonus Free SlotPlay.
At the end of the promotion, the top 3 guests who donated the most food overall will win up to $5,000 Free SlotPlay!
All food items collected will be donated to Seagate Food Bank!

* Only non-perishable & non-expired food items accepted. Please see Player Services for complete details.", "email": "", "url": "https://seagatefoodbank.org/hollywood-gives-food-drive/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "526 High Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Southside", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43609", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 41.6376062, "longitude": -83.55102049999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(419) 244-6996", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}]}
